column2: "Isn't that a waste? Can't you do anything you want wherever you go with your skills?"
"Well then, would you join me in rampaging through the ruins, riding the wind at our whim?"
"My goodness, the ruins are a lovely place. First of all, the hostiles there are awfully tenacious."
"It's a place where we can do whatever we want-shooting, taunting, bumping off, or killing-without anyone getting angry."
"Come, come. It's great. Let's go to the ruins right away. Let's enjoy some shooting and doing what we want."
